file.name: media-type.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.1"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Swagger Petstore
paths:
  /pets:
    get:
      requestBody:
        content:
          'application': {}   # Noncompliant {{Declared media type range should conform to RFC7231.}}
#         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^
          'text/*': {}
      responses:
        '200':
          description: some operation
          content:
            'application': {} # Noncompliant {{Declared media type range should conform to RFC7231.}}
      parameters:
        - name: someParam
          in: query
          content:
            'application': {} # Noncompliant {{Declared mime type should conform to RFC6838.}}
            'text/plain': {}  # invalid (only 1 content allowed by spec), but should not be caught by this rule
        - name: otherParam
          in: path
    post:
      responses:
         '200':
           description: some operation

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /pets: get: parameters: parse parameter "someParam": content: "content" map MUST only contain one entry
